description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Love to slaughter endless waves of zombies? Then this is the game for you! This is the original Living Dead, previously featured on the marketplace, with upgraded soundtracks!
